text:
Blinkleuchten LED in Außenspiegel integriert
Heckleuchten (Glühlampen)
Licht- und Regensensor
Scheibenwaschdüsen heizbar
Dachkantenspoiler
Stoßfänger Sport-Design (S-line, Kontrast-Lackierung)
Frontscheibe Akustikglas

Radioempfang digital (DAB)
Sprachsteuerungs-System
Universal-Schnittstelle Bluetooth
Multi-Media-Interface MMI Basic Plus / MMI Radio Plus
• 6 Lautsprecher

Kombiinstrument digital
Reifenkontroll-Anzeige
Geschwindigkeits-Begrenzeranlage

Airbag Beifahrerseite abschaltbar
Mittelarmlehne vorn mit Fach
Fußmatten Velours
Komfort-Klimaautomatik 2-Zonen
Standklimatisierung
Funkschlüssel
Kindersicherung elektr. betätigt

Wegfahrsperre (elektronisch)
Akustischer Fußgängerschutz, Außensound (e-sound)
Anti-Blockier-System (ABS)
Fahrassistenz-System: Bremsassistent (Audi pre sense front)
Komfort-Fahrwerk
Audi Drive Select
Fahrassistenz-System: Spurwechsel- u. Spurhalteassistent (Side Assist und Lane Assist)

trans:
LED flashing lights integrated in exterior mirrors
Rear lights (bulbs)
Light and rain sensor
Heatable windshield washer nozzles
Roof edge spoiler
Sport design bumper (S-line, contrast paintwork)
Acoustic glass windscreen
• Windshield with thermal insulation glazing
Digital radio reception (DAB)
Voice control system
Bluetooth universal interface
Multi-media interface MMI Basic Plus / MMI Radio Plus
• 6 speakers
• Interior: inlays in the dashboard accent parts in black glass look
Digital instrument cluster
Tire monitoring display
Speed limiter system
Airbag driver/passenger side
Head airbag system (Sideguard)
Front side airbag
Passenger side airbag can be deactivated
Front center armrest with storage compartment
Velour floor mats
Comfort automatic air conditioning 2-zone
Parking cooler
Radio key
Electrically operated child safety lock
Driving assistance system: Occupant protection system (Audi pre sense basic)
Immobilizer (electronic)
Acoustic pedestrian protection, exterior sound (e-sound)
Anti-lock braking system (ABS)
Driving assistance system: Brake assist (Audi pre sense front)
Comfort suspension
Audi Drive Select
Driving assistance system: Lane change and lane keeping assistant (Side Assist and Lane Assist)
LM rims 7x18 (5 V-spoke design, S design)
Tire repair kit
Progressive steering
Electron. Stability Control (ESC)
